newsitem.title: SPAIN: Wall St surge drives Madrid stocks up strongly.
newsitem.headline: Wall St surge drives Madrid stocks up strongly.

text.p: MADRID, July 23 (Reuter) 0835 GMT - Share prices in Madrid were strongly higher on Wednesday, taking heart from a renewed surge on Wall Street and a rise in the dollar, dealers said.
Trade was heavier than in recent days, and the market appeared prepared to gain more amid continued positive foreign references and first half corporate results, dealers said.
Next Ibex resistance was pegged around 7,200.
* General index opens up 12.81 points, 2.09 percent, to 625.97.
* Banks surge after BCH results provide tonic.
* Endesa up 340 pta to 12,550 ahead of Thursday share split.
